name: Void Drifter
description:
Rosaline, the Void Drifter, has the unenviable task of rescuing lost travelers whenever they show up in the Void, a mysterious, dreamlike dimension. Currently, there is only one "main" quest, but the hope is to expand on the game continually until it's completed.

Features graphics by FSM, Wato, and White Screw Shop, and music and sound by MaouDamashii,  Moonwind, Karugamo BGM,  and M-Art.
